Articles.Content:
I've been following the thread for a while, but I don't understand the technical aspects of what you folks are talking about (but I super-super-appreciate the work sirkut and omgnull everyone helping test/fix things is putting in).

Judging by the thread today, it sounds like there is still a bit of misbehaviour with the 0.14 update - do you guys think it's reliable enough to [back up my save and then] stick it into my main Career mode game? Or is the consensus "give it a few more days to iron out the bugs"?

P.S. donated!

With my testing I'm leaning towards it being fixed but since it was 3:37AM when I released the plugin I just wanted to be safe. Make a backup of your game and give it a try and see what happens.

Btw. Thanks for the donation.
I don't see the servo control when on launch in flight anywhere outside

I don't see the servo control when on launch in flight anywhere outside

Did you include the toolbar in the gamedata folder? If you did do you have a log file that we can see?

Sirkit!!! You absolute LEGEND!!! You've made my Sunday!!

I've just done a few quick tests with existing craft and everything seems to be working perfectly. I've tested with my two most IR heavy craft (my orbiter's arm and a ground crew truck and trailer with multiple arms for towing planes). Both and mod heavy and worked exactly as intended!! Excellent!

I really appreciate the work and time you've put into this, so I've sent you a small donation. It is to be used to purchase beer!

I saw your post a couple pages back about your Mum, I hope she's ok now. That's gotta be pretty stressful.

Edited April 21, 2014 by katateochi
stupid typo
I Love YOU

Kat, you might want to check your second-to-last sentence, your KSP addiction is showing.

That said, really glad this is fixed, no matter how tentatively. Thanks!

Yes. and clicked the ir button.

Side note. Whoever made the 00_toolbar should disable it being downloaded in different mods.

OR

Update all mods with the newest version.

This mod comes with

1.4.4, 2014-01-27

- Fixed a bug where the toolbar would get completely invisible under certain

circumstances.

I found a new version somewhere else.

Great job sirkut and omgnull!

I knew that in collaboration, great minds would solve the problem much faster. Thanks for listening. I hope you keep at it on git.

Regards,

Is it fixed?! Fantastic! Thanks for all you work!

... goes off to make a variable geometry plane

Yes. and clicked the ir button.

Side note. Whoever made the 00_toolbar should disable it being downloaded in different mods.

This mod comes with

circumstances.

I found a new version somewhere else.

The toolbar plugin actually checks the internet and will let you know when there is an update. Must have been broken. Sorry you had issues but the time I uploaded the plugin it didn't alert me. Is it workin for you now?

No. I have a new version of the toolbar. Not the issue. Just a hey heads up thing. I've noticed other mods like that. They get you to download 2 mods when you only want 1.

I can't remember what it was. I just know I didn't download it because of that.

Beside the point.

I don't see the servo control when on launch in flight anywhere outside.

Oh read your post again. Log file?

in toolbar or ir.

I have the file. Thats the easy part.

How to find and post?

I can run a computer better than some and worse than others but normally when I see download and modify this.

I shut the window.

KSP/Gamedata/???

Any idea when the new models from ZodiusInfuser will be implemented/finished?

Similar to Sirkut my free time has been extremely limited of late. Now that IR seems to be mostly working, I may explore releasing an Untextured pack to select people interested in trying things out.

No. I have a new version of the toolbar. Not the issue. Just a hey heads up thing. I've noticed other mods like that. They get you to download 2 mods when you only want 1.

I can't remember what it was. I just know I didn't download it because of that.

Beside the point.

I don't see the servo control when on launch in flight anywhere outside.

Oh read your post again. Log file?

in toolbar or ir.

I have the file. Thats the easy part.

How to find and post?

I can run a computer better than some and worse than others but normally when I see download and modify this.

I shut the window.

KSP/Gamedata/???

The file is output_log.txt it's in the ksp_data directory. You can upload it to pastebin and give us the link.

Similar to Sirkut my free time has been extremely limited of late. Now that IR seems to be mostly working, I may explore releasing an Untextured pack to select people interested in trying things out.

I'm looking forward to trying them out. You certainly got a greater vision than what I mustered up with the models I've done.

I am currently in testing stage and have ran into problems with the following craft file.

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/5116881/PoweredHingeTest.craft

It seems to work perfectly fine, rotating along the right axis, just the opposite direction.

Same goes for all other parts. They move/rotate in the opposite way.

I am currently using a ton of mods including KW Rocketry, FAR, Interstellar, etc...

I may try it with a fresh install if required.

I'm looking forward to trying them out. You certainly got a greater vision than what I mustered up with the models I've done.

regardless of looks .. the function WORKS ! .. now to make them pretty

oh and Sirkut, message for your gran ! :

Hey, this is a really noob question I know, but how do I download the latest version? I'm not familiar with github at all, and I can't figure it out

Cheers.

Hey, this is a really noob question I know, but how do I download the latest version? I'm not familiar with github at all, and I can't figure it out

Cheers.

In the github directory, open the "Parts" folder and click on the zip file, then click "Raw".

Edit: On my way to test the update out!

Pastebin?

............

It's a place where you can copy and paste text. Open the file, copy and paste the text to tho website: http://pastebin.com/. After you this you should be provided a link to share. Let us know the link here. I'm on my phone so I can't give you full instructions. I suppose I will add that to the bottom of my OP.
